title: New: Fitness Club Fiasco – Goldmine
body:
I’m not quite sure why it’s taken me so long to realise that **Bastille** are just a watered down version of **The Killers**, without any of the bravado or Springsteen pompousness.

Ontario quintet **Fitness Club Fiasco** undoubtedly owe a fair amount to the moustachioed mormon and co, with their sugary sweet, too epic for words single _Goldmine_. ‘You’ve got me standing on a goldmine, when I’m looking into your eyes’ serenades lead singer and chief songwriter **Mike Harloff**, on a chorus that is one of the most guiltily enjoyable of the year.

Ontario quintet Fitness Club Fiasco undoubtedly owe a fair amount to the moustachioed mormon and co, with their sugary sweet, too epic for words \[…\]
